stimulusHtml: The diagram above shows the cross section of a long cable that has an inner wire of radius R surrounded by a conducting sheath of outer radius 2R. The wire and the sheath carry currents in opposite directions but with the same uniform current density J. What is the magnitude of the magnetic field at the surface of the outer conductor?
